OCD.name: Snowball Sampling (n nodes)
OCD.description: Samples from a graph using N-node snowball sampling

AD.name: Nodes
AD.description: The number of nodes to sample from the graph

OCD.name: Node Sampling
OCD.description: Samples from a graph by choosing a random N nodes and the intervening edges

AD.name: Nodes
AD.description: The number of nodes to sample from the graph

OCD.name: Edge Sampling
OCD.description: Samples from a graph by choosing a random N edges and the attached nodes

AD.name: Edges
AD.description: The number of edges to sample from the graph
